verbs.description: it my brain adhd [V: can] affect adults too bursting with energy and creativity he paces his office speaking rapidly into a wireless phone as he tries to keep up with thoughts that race through his mind like cars on a speedway at 54 he runs the world largest training program for attention deficit hyperactivity disorder adhd coaches the add coach academy in albany adhd is a neurological disorder that starts in childhood but though some children seem to grow out of it david giwerc adhd dr stephen phelps attention deficit hyperactivity disorder
